pullRequest.title: JENA-2015: RDF* annotation syntax
pullRequest.bodyText:
JENA-2015
includes as noted the Javacc turtle parser cleanup.
Does not include companion SPARQL* annotation syntax. (RDF* term syntax is already implemented.)

nodes.bodyText: Was this code elsewhere and it was then moved here? Or is it duplicated? I remember seeing some similar code a few days ago I think.
